fields.description:
When "fix the basic", we use temporary work around by adding count into category tree and adding sorting function for it. This is because seo-urls-category is not ready yet.

When seo-urls-category is ready, we should clean up temp solution.
fields.summary: Test Debian and Fedora packages in Evergreen

comments.body: Clean up code changes in ULIVZ-35759, ULIVZ-36775, ULIVZ-36774.

ULIVZ-BDD-BAPI cases updated on branch: 

AC-ULIVZ-36915-CC

Pick up this ticket after ULIVZ-36800 get resolved. 
1. update bolt-platform branch AC-ULIVZ-36915-CC with latest stable master
2. run BAPI cases branch AC-ULIVZ-36915-CC on bolt-platform branch to make sure the pipeline passes.
3. other basic regression tests
Open because the prerequisite ULIVZ-36800 is reopened.

items.fromString:
When "fix the basic", we use temporary work around by adding count into category tree and adding sorting function for it. This is because seo-urls-category is not ready yet.

When seo-urls-category is ready, we should use this API instead of the temporary work around.
items.toString:
When "fix the basic", we use temporary work around by adding count into category tree and adding sorting function for it. This is because seo-urls-category is not ready yet.

When seo-urls-category is ready, we should clean up temp solution.
This issue is follow-up of ULIVZ-36800
